item.title: Preview LaTeX in Org Mode with Emacs in MacOS
item.description: Using the right Emacs Version #I failed to preview LaTeX with emacs-plus. If you have installed d12frosted/emacs-plus, uninstall it and use emacs-mac. brew tap railwaycat/emacsmacport brew install emacs-mac If you like the fancy spacemacs icon, install it with cask: brew cask install emacs-mac-spacemacs-icon

item.title: Deploy Nikola Org Mode on Travis
item.description: Recently, I enjoy using Spacemacs, so I decided to switch to org file from Markdown for writing blog. After several attempts, I managed to let Travis convert org file to HTML. Here are the steps. Install Org Mode plugin #First you need to install Org Mode plugin on your computer following the official guide: Nikola orgmode plugin.
